[00:00.00]Boom Clap - Charli XCX
[00:00.10]Lyrics by：Aitchison/P. Berger/Fredrik Berger/Gräslund
[00:00.20]Composed by：Aitchison/P. Berger/Fredrik Berger/Gräslund
[00:00.30]Boom boom boom clap
[00:02.43]
[00:13.56]You're picture perfect blue
[00:15.97]Sunbathing under the moon
[00:18.58]Stars shining as your bones illuminate
[00:21.74]
[00:23.85]First kiss just like a d**g
[00:26.49]Under your influence
[00:29.02]You take me over you're the magic in my veins
[00:32.32]This must be love
[00:34.17]Boom clap
[00:35.32]The sound of my heart
[00:36.44]The beat goes on and on and on and on and
[00:39.38]Boom clap
[00:40.29]You make me feel good
[00:41.55]Come on to me come on to me now
